short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes your Slack happier by automatically adding happy emojis to the end of your messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically adds a happy emoji to the end of your slack messages. It helps to be more friendly and make your coworkers smile.
